scenario_text.value:
Are either of you concerned about Kaito and
that woman fighting?

Hey, Kaito’s a friend. I think you should at
least be a little concerned.
You keep talking about Kaito. Who is he?
What? Oh, right. You never did meet him.

Is he really a friend? You’re sure he’s not
a monster?
Don’t worry! He’s definitely a friend!
Are you done yet? Can we go?
